title: Clean sans - Looks like Franklin Gothic?
content:
Came across this on-line, anyone have any idea which font it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LD-Wordmark-Large_4773.png)

Forgive me if it is obvious, I have been out of the typography/design game for a few years now and just am a little rusty. Thanks in advance!!

Iain
author: Iain Wall

comments.content:
All letters except |r| and |t| look very close to **Apercu (Bold)**:  
 [http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025656/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/bold "http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/bold")  
(I suppose /r is created from scratch and the /t's top is a bit customized, unless there are some alternates - I don't know).
